fields.description:
I have observed ClassNotFoundException: org.apache.hadoop.hive.kafka.KafkaDagCredentialSupplier on tez view creation in 4.0.1 Hive.
Also same log observed while running test TestBeeLineWithArgs#testRowsAffected.
It's always good to fix ClassNotFoundException

comments.body:
[~chiruburri], the issue already exists. Check HIVE-28965.

Mark this one as duplicate and close this. For future, cloning the Jira for entirely different issue is not a best practice in my opinion, it creates unreleated links.

CC [~dkuzmenko]Â
Thanks for replying, sure i will create new from next time and  i will close this ticket and follow HIVE-28965
